title.rendered: Valutico to announce Daniel Krüger as Product Manager

content.rendered:
Valutico is pleased to announce and welcome Daniel Krüger as Senior Product Manager! 🎉🎉🎉

Daniel will be responsible for strengthening Valutico’s product strategy, managing the entire product development cycle & expanding on product marketing activities. He has a successful track record in product management & marketing in both established and fast growing companies.

We are confident that this new step will enable Valutico to continue its fast growth and and out-innovate its competition! We are looking forward to further work towards identifying opportunities and implementing new features that will have a significant impact on the long term success of our clients and partners!

Please join us in giving Daniel a warm welcome to our team!
